user.title: Clash Controller Setup
user.description: Enter the API address and token for your Clash instance. Examples: 192.168.1.1:9090, clash.mydomain.com. If the location is an IP address, make sure it's static.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the API. Verify the address and try again.
error.invalid_token: The provided API token is invalid. Please check and try again.
error.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

abort.already_configured: The instance at this location is already added. Use configure to update token or create another entry to update instance location.
